project_snapshot_md:
# MOVA Skills Lab — Project Snapshot (2025-12-09, after L3_01 DPP passport normalize contracts)

## 1. Overview
State after adding lab schemas for DPP normalization input and run envelope, with examples and mova_check_basic validation. Core remains MOVA 4.0.0; spec/mova-4.1.0-draft is reference only. Branch: feature/dpp-base-pack-v0.1.

## 2. Structure (short)
```
mova_skills_lab/
├── core/mova/{00_MANIFEST.json, ds/, env/, episodes/, global/, specs/}
├── docs/{... , PROJECT_MEMORY/...}
├── lab/{schemas/, env/, examples/, skill_runs/, tools/}
├── skills/{... , mova_check_basic, repo_snapshot_basic}
├── spec/mova-4.1.0-draft/{docs/, examples/, schemas/, tools/}
└── package.json, package-lock.json
```

## 3. New in DPP (L3_01)
- Added lab schema `ds.dpp_passport_normalize_input_v1` (near-identity to extended passport input).
- Added lab envelope `env.dpp_passport_normalize_run_v1` for normalization requests.
- Added examples for input and run envelope; validated via `skill.mova_check_basic` (status: ok).

## 4. Notes
- Normalization engine implementation will follow in L3_02 (skill-level).
- Snapshot captures repository state after L3_01 contracts.
